description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Are you brave enough to bear anguish and terror? Faceless Killer is back, to end what he didn't accomplished three years ago. Fear is waiting for you just around the corner. Write your destiny, nothing is still settled..12 different dooms are waiting for you.. The new masterpiece signed by The Prince of Terror, Claudio Battiato..
description.short: Are you brave enough to bear anguish and terror? Faceless Killer is back, to end what he didn't accomplished three years ago. Fear is waiting for you just around the corner. Write your destiny, nothing is still settled..12 different dooms are waiting for you.. The new masterpiece signed by The Prince of Terror, Claudio Battiato..
